Directions: Read this poem. Then answer the questions. Some questions may ask you about certain lines. The lines are numbered on the left side.
Title: Rivulet¹
Author: by Aramís Quintero
Content: with its ringing, singing, light laughter,
there goes the thread of water.
it collects in a small pool—
Fine with me if it says so
